item.title: Coursera
item.dc:creator: cms
item.description: Coursera is an online LMS (Learning Management System) that partner’s with some of the world’s best universities and organizations to offer several high quality courses online.
item.content:encoded: Coursera is an online LMS (Learning Management System) that partner’s with some of the world’s best universities and organizations to offer several high quality courses online.

item.title: Mockup Templates
